tweets.text: this is the e=mc squared of robot brains, this little drawing contains magic much larger than the sum of its parts https://t.co/AYDHdYZqI6

If I could tell my younger self anything; you will make remarkable things, and people will not understand what makes them remarkable until long after you have grown bored with them- you cannot rely on the reactions of others to gauge your success, just trust your intuition
these people bought and then shuttered an entire tik tok predecessor and couldn't even take the time to let us save a thread in advance - skill issue

lmfao this was some pre-Musk Twitter fuckery, but truly, imagine being employed by this website for over 10 years and then leaving it like this knowing that no one will ever implement the ability to save a thread on Twitter ever for as long as we live https://t.co/l5wvLEKIND
anxious about the coming week? uhhhhh, no, why do you ask https://t.co/i5rzBRNIwL
@TravelingAnna oh my god I have been training my whole life for this, I will be your weed concierge, I have a whole dek
cant sleep. too excited.

I want to become a billionaire and then spend it all on Oakland.
RT @jasonfried: I‚Äôm starting to believe nothing should be designed in a day. A design needs to stand up to fresh eyes in the morning.
@enjalot That sounds amazing.

My new sounds: WakeMe (WIP) on #SoundCloud http://snd.sc/hup7HJ
There's more awful, shameful music in my iTunes that I never listen to than I would care to share.
Laying around with Samara.
http://twitpic.com/34mil - Peter's TV stand is awesome
Alright, ears. Meet Bandanna. He gon' fuck you up.
Looking up brass knuckles on eBay.
RELEASEEEEEE
Drinking Tropicana's Grapefruit 'Juice Beverage' which is actually pretty good.
@mibi Congratulations anyway. What infographic are they using your 'data and research' for?
Nope. Nope, I lied. BTS numbers go from Jan 1 1990 to Dec 1 2000, and then skips to Jan 1 2009. BECAUSE THAT'S REALLY USEFUL.
Uhm... these Bureau of Transportation Statistics Vehicle Miles Traveled stats go from Jan 1 1990 to Dec 8 2009 - BTS predicts the future?
#lastfm #love The Marxist Brothers by NOFX http://bit.ly/4tnNhz
I think I'm gonna try and make it to the NYC Anarchist Bookfair.
I may have sold out at 16.
Gotham condensed... I love you. I love you a lot. Marry me?
There are lots of songs I've heard too many times over my life. Somehow 'Lives' by Modest Mouse is inching closer to the edge. AS I TYPE. :o
I should maybe put more than 0 effort into mixing.
Ate some tums. Took some ibuprofen. Not feeling well. THREW IT ALL UP. Damn it.
"Yeah, I messed with the colors in photoshop but it's not like... PHOTOSHOPPED"
I'm totally getting the Stuff White People Like book. ( http://is.gd/5jF ) What exactly that says about me, I am not sure.
Finished Presentation #2. Feel pretty good.
Good morning. It's beautiful outside today. I think I'm going to check out the Macbook Air later too. Took me long enough, eh?
I love bagels. I love macbooks. I love Law & Order.
I love how when you see one thing and inventory it in your head, you see it everywhere and get insight on the original thing.
Just saw a transparent fridge on CSI, which I want. All I could find was http://is.gd/58V which mentions a drawered fridge (as seen on +KN).
Just saw two ads talking about combatting climate change in a row from unrelated companies. This is progress.
Sitting around watching the food channel and missing the family. I'm 40 tweets away from the 2,000 mark.

posts.title: Starting A Studio Introducing Room 302
posts.dek: In which the author proudly presents his new venture: Room 302 Studio, an eclectic gathering of talent devoted to fostering joy-driven development
